abstract: Andrew J. Ries gives us a stairway to, well, both places.
lead_paragraph: SATURDAY PUZZLE — Andrew J. Ries, our constructor today, has hit for the crossword cycle, and then some: He’s done grids for every day of the week and even a few Sunday variety puzzles. Most of his grids come on the weekends,  so weekend solvers  get to sample his wares pretty often and gain some familiarity.
